text:
e="preserve">Ali Akbar Moinfar (Persian: علی‌اکبر معین‌فر‎) (14 January 1928 – 2 January 2018) was an Iranian politician. He served as the first Petroleum Minister of Iran. He was a member of the Islamic Consultative Assembly representing Tehran from 1980 through 1984. He was born in Tehran.
Moinfar died in Tehran on 2 January 2018 of renal failure at the age of 89.
